title: big ping spikes out of nowhere
body: like in title Ive been getting ping spikes for no reason after patch 7.5, it jumps from 45 to 300-400 for no reason. I've turned off phones and laptops, resetting router but it still keeps happening

replies.body: It sounds like you might be suffering from some packet loss, which can be caused by an unstable connection or routing from your network to our game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get a clear analysis of your specific case.  Let me know what you find!
